attributes.action: Abolish UK Membersip of The European Court of Human Rights
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: -and replace it with legislation more appropriate for the citizens of the UK which will place more emphasis on protecting the rights of honest law abiding UK citizens and less on protecting criminals, illegal economic migrants, and other persons who "know how to use the system" to obtain financial benefits and to prevent fatcat members of the legal profession from earning huge fees from taxpayer's funds, which could otherwise be better spent in Health, Education and the Armed Services.
